thread.title: Luke Bryan stays simple during Super Bowl National Anthem
thread.title_full: Luke Bryan stays simple during Super Bowl National Anthem

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Luke Bryan stays simple during Super Bowl National Anthem
text:
Luke Bryan stays simple, takes it slow during Super Bowl National Anthem Luke Bryan stays simple during Super Bowl National Anthem NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Sunday, February 5, 2017, 6:35 PM 
Luke Bryan wasn’t risking any slip-ups when he took the stage Sunday night to perform the National Anthem during Super Bowl LI. 
Midfield in Houston, the country singer kept his rendition of the Star-Spangled Banner simple, without any frills or vocal exercises. 
The “Crash My Party” singer said earlier in the week that his performance would “follow the vibe of the room,” so let’s hope the actual football game isn’t as boring as the song. Luke Bryan's National Anthem came in at two minutes and four seconds. (Matthew Emmons/USA Today Sports) 
Bryan’s National Anthem came in under the Vegas line at two minutes and four seconds. Tags:
